title: Marc Sessler on Browns, Hard Knocks, sleeper teams (Football 08/23)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Marc Sessler of NFL.com and the Around the NFL Podcast to break down how the Cleveland Browns have looked on "Hard Knocks," what kind of expectations we should have for this team in 2018, how he feels about Baker vs. Darnold and what teams he might be eying as possible breakthrough squads in 2018.
